§ 1962. Detail of police The Capitol Police Board is authorized to detail police from the House Office, Senate Office, and Capitol Buildings for police duty on the Capitol Grounds and on the Library of Congress Grounds. (Pub. L. 96–432, § 5, Oct. 10, 1980, 94 Stat. 1853.)
